title: Dream Yoga: Disciplined Lucid Dreaming for Real World Application
author: marsresident / Van Kush Family
overview: Tibetan Dream Yoga as structured spiritual practice beyond basic lucid dreaming - a 1,000+ year old system where 'realize you're dreaming' is step 1, not the last step

key_difference_from_regular_lucid_guides.regular_guides: Focus on WILD, MILD, DILD, WBTB techniques, end at lucid dreaming
key_difference_from_regular_lucid_guides.dream_yoga: 'Realize you are dreaming' is STEP 1, not the last step

dream_yoga_purpose.view: Dream world is place where you can gain enlightenment
dream_yoga_purpose.goal: Make massive progress in your dreams
dream_yoga_purpose.basis: Similar to regular Yoga - based on same ideas

step_1.name: Realize You Are Dreaming
step_1.note: This is just the beginning in Dream Yoga

step_2.name: Eliminate Fear
step_2.method: Realize you are not in real world - no restrictions
exercises: Find snakes or anything you fear

step_3.name: Contemplate Reality
step_3.method: Meditate on reality while in dream
step_3.focus: How real world is similar in time passing, things happening

step_4.name: Control Dream Physics
examples: Make tree carry you to clouds

step_5.name: Realize You Can Change
step_5.insight: In the dream you are not a constant object

step_6.name: Contact Entities and Travel
step_6.goal: Travel to different places with/through entities

techniques.dream_journal: Write down dreams - essential for comparing to reality
techniques.meditation_on_dreams: Think about dreams while meditating (opposite of meditating in dream)
techniques.daily_review: Before sleep, review day: people, places, food, activities

ah_syllable_technique.method: Imagine symbol in middle of chest
ah_syllable_technique.result: Helps go into vivid or lucid dream

ultimate_goal.primary: Treat dream world and reality the same
ultimate_goal.secondary: Find better center to go through day with
ultimate_goal.practical: Looking at problems as 'dream problems' makes them easier
ultimate_goal.mindset: Being able to think 'I want to dream about that' transforms any situation

quiz_questions.q: How does Dream Yoga differ from regular lucid dream guides?
quiz_questions.a: 'Realize you are dreaming' is step 1 in Dream Yoga, not the final goal
quiz_questions.explanation: Dream Yoga has structured progression toward enlightenment

quiz_questions.q: What is the RAOM GAOM mantra?
quiz_questions.a: Tibetan mantra (RRRAAAOOOMMMM, GGGGAAAOOOMMM with emphasis on O) done when waking to remember dreams
Loka = worlds you travel to (Sanskrit/Hindu); Yidam = entities you contact (Buddhist Yoga)
quiz_questions.explanation: Step 6 of Dream Yoga - contact entities and travel to other realms

quiz_questions.q: What is the ultimate goal of Dream Yoga?
quiz_questions.a: Treat dream world and reality the same - find better center for daily life
quiz_questions.explanation: Viewing problems as 'dream problems' makes them easier to solve

achievement_unlocks: Dream Yogi: Know all 6 steps of Dream Yoga
Fear Conqueror: Understand dream fear elimination
Reality Meditator: Practice contemplating reality in dreams
Mantra Master: Know RAOM GAOM and Ah syllable techniques

van_kush_connection.author: marsresident is Van Kush Family STEEM account
van_kush_connection.relevance: 1,000+ year Tibetan practice complements Oilahuasca consciousness work
van_kush_connection.application: Van Kush temple teaching of systematic dream practice
van_kush_connection.philosophy: Multiple paths to enlightenment - dream states as valid as waking sacrament
